title: 有無人試過係呢間外國網站買野

replies.msg:
https://www.pioneerrevival.com/

買左成個半月都未收到 係咪呃錢

Pioneer Revival will not refund any customer whose order is not received because the shipping address provided during the checkout process was inaccurate or incomplete.

If your package was delivered but you did not receive it or if your package is missing, it is your responsibility to first contact your local USPS carrier to report the issue concerning your stolen/lost/undelivered parcel. Once you have contacted the Post Office concerning your stolen/lost/undelivered parcel, please email us at Support@Pioneerrevival.com and we will work with you to see if we will need to reship your order or issue a refund on a case-by-case basis.

For missing International packages, We will not send out a second package. We will offer, on a case to case basis a refund minus shipping costs.

呢D係咪呃錢常用技倆?戴哂頭盔咁
我都有呢啲經驗，買完六個星期咩都收唔到，又係外國網，send email去support完全冇覆過，又冇shipment tracking,就咁冇左幾舊水
無試過係呢間，不過試過係teechip買衛衣，都等咗兩個月先到

佢咪話會退返貨錢俾你，你問咗佢未，同佢講乜柒都收唔到，睇吓佢點

仲乜去啲咁膠嘅網買嘢

個order number明明已經係個標題到,佢自動回覆都有誠意D啊大佬
Hey there! Thanks for contacting our customer support here at Pioneer Revival. This is an automated response to hopefully help you with an answer sooner then later. We try to solve all cases as fast as possible and reply within 48 hours.

Did you include your order number? Your order number is in the title of all emails provided from us. In example, 'Your order #00000 is on the way!'.

RESIN NECKLACE ALERT -
Due to high demand, we have a delay in the production and shipping on the Resin Necklaces. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause you. Please expect a 7-10 day delay added on top of your original shipping time of 18 business days in delivery on your order if it contained the Resin Necklace. If you have any other questions feel free to ask!

Our current hours of response are 10am - 6pm ET, Monday to Friday. Please note all customer inquiries are processed on a first-come, first-serve basis. This email was sent automatically to notify you not to send multiple requests within a short time. This will delay your inquiry to the back of the line.
